name: European Adventure
description: A week-long exploration of the City of Light, visiting iconic landmarks, world-class museums, and experiencing authentic French cuisine. Perfect blend of culture, history, and romance.

name: Tokyo Explorer
description: Immerse yourself in the fascinating contrast of traditional and modern Japan. From ancient temples to cutting-edge technology, neon-lit streets to serene gardens.

name: Santorini Escape
description: A romantic getaway to the stunning Greek island with its iconic blue-domed churches, dramatic cliff views, and unforgettable sunsets over the Aegean Sea.

name: New York City Break
description: The ultimate urban adventure in the city that never sleeps. Broadway shows, world-class dining, iconic landmarks, and the vibrant energy of Manhattan.

name: Bali Retreat
description: A peaceful retreat to the Island of the Gods, featuring pristine beaches, ancient temples, lush rice terraces, and rejuvenating spa experiences.

name: Swiss Alps Adventure
description: Winter wonderland adventure in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Skiing, snowboarding, mountain railways, and cozy alpine villages covered in snow.

name: Morocco Discovery
description: Exotic adventure through the vibrant souks, stunning palaces, and enchanting desert landscapes. Experience the rich culture and warm hospitality of Morocco.

name: Iceland Northern Lights
description: Chase the magical Aurora Borealis while exploring dramatic waterfalls, geysers, glaciers, and the otherworldly landscapes of the land of fire and ice.

name: Australian Coastline
description: Explore the stunning harbor city with its iconic Opera House and Harbour Bridge, beautiful beaches, and laid-back Australian lifestyle.

name: Costa Rica Nature
description: Eco-adventure through lush rainforests, exotic wildlife, pristine beaches, and volcanic landscapes. Perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers.
